entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 12:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1300 metres. Wind east 30 km/h. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers except snow over higher terrain overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to near valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snow over higher terrain early in the morning. Snow level rising to 1500 metres near noon. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
